bi_etl.components.sqlquery module¶

Created on Sep 17, 2014

@author: woodd

class bi_etl.components.sqlquery.SQLQuery(task, database, sql, logical_name=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: bi_etl.components.etlcomponent.ETLComponent

A class for reading an arbitrary SQL statement. Consider using sqlalchemy.sql.text to wrap the SQL. http://docs.sqlalchemy.org/en/latest/core/tutorial.html#using-text

__iter__()[source]¶

Run the SQL as is with no parameters or substitutions.

run_parameters(**parameters)[source]¶

Run the SQL providing optional bind parameters. (:param in the SQL)

run_substitute(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Uses Python string formatting like {} or {name} to build a SQL string. Can be used to dynamically change the structure of the SQL, compared to bind variables which are more limited but faster.
